scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/sass --output canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/css/**/*.css' && postcss --use cssnano --dir canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/minified 'canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build-js: yarn run copy-3rd-party-js && yarn run build-js-transpile
scripts.copy-3rd-party-js: mkdir -p canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules && cp node_modules/d3/build/d3.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/d3-geo/dist/d3-geo.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/topojson-client/dist/topojson-client.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/billboard.js/dist/billboard.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/clipboard/dist/clipboard.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/ && cp node_modules/raven-js/dist/raven.min.js canonicalwebteam/snapstore/static/js/modules/
scripts.build: yarn run build-js && yarn run build-css
